resources.string:
What is CallTrendz
Ever wondered what is the day of week when you use your phone most? Ever wondered
what hour of day you receive maximum number of calls? Interesting… huuuf.. but who will tell you all this ? Calltrendz! Calltrendz helps you to understand your phone usage patterns. Calltrendz observes all your incoming and outgoing calls and presents you with very meaningful and simple graphs showing your phone usage. Looking at the graph you can immediately know the things such as what is the hour of day when you have received maximum number of calls
Well… sounds great.. but whats the use of this information ?
1. Tune your mobile subscription plans and save $$ 2. Predict if you are likely to get many calls in certain time period and may be put your phone in ‘flight mode’ if you dont want to get disturbed in that timeslot.
Any issues/queries/suggestions please mail us at gopi@gopicreations.com
